title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        2016 Brooks Camp Construction Postponed  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, 2016 Brooks Camp Construction Postponed  The bridge construction project that was initially planned for 2016 has been postponed until 2017. more
